Generation V.Black: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.
Generation V.White: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
Generation V.Black 2: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.
Generation V.White 2: Males swing the plumage on their heads to threaten others, but females are better at flying.

Generation VI.X: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.
Generation VI.Y: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

Generation VIII.Sword: Females of this species are very capable fliers, particularly notable for their stamina. They also take longer to adjust to people.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon is intelligent and intensely proud. People will sit up and take notice if you become the Trainer of one.
